definition: The Broken Bridge (at West Lake in Hangzhou)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
bridge/CL:座[zuo4]

sentences.english: Broken Bridge remaining snow is the famous scene of West- Lake, belong to one of ten scenes of West-Lake.
sentences.chinese: 断桥残雪是西湖上著名的景色，属于西湖十景之一。

sentences.english: What problems should be faced in the operating process of the aluminum doors and windows.
sentences.chinese: 断桥铝门窗在操作过程中应正视哪些问题问题。

sentences.english: However, i ty dance as stand alone bridge.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我却青衣舞袖般孤独地伫立断桥。

sentences.english: Aluminum green building materials, recycling economy.
sentences.chinese: 断桥铝绿色建材，循环经济。

sentences.english: Although the Broken Bridge has only four archers left.
sentences.chinese: 虽然现在的断桥只剩下四孔。

sentences.english: And then we'll go over and take a look at that bridge.
sentences.chinese: 先看这座断桥，然后再到那边去看看。

sentences.english: They are generated in the bridge, meet some wonderful story.
sentences.chinese: 他们就是在断桥相会而产生了一段美好的故事的。

sentences.english: Well you can tell him I'll never set foot in Arefu again.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，你回去告诉他，我不会再踏入断桥镇半步了。

sentences.english: It is said every visitor to Dandong, would come to the Broken Bridge for a look.
sentences.chinese: 听说几乎每一个来丹东的人都会到断桥来看一看。

sentences.english: It is now a severed bridge with only four arches. It has since become a witness of history.
sentences.chinese: 剩下的四孔断桥，从此就成为了一段历史的见证。

sentences.english: In the wilderness of the bridge, while, the growth with a plum trees.
sentences.chinese: 在荒郊野外的断桥边，生长着一株梅树。

sentences.english: You shouldn't miss Broken Bridge when you are on a visit to Hangzhou .
sentences.chinese: 当你在杭州游玩时，你不该错过断桥。

definition: Leifeng Pagoda, by West Lake until it was destroyed (also from Madam White Snake)
Solitary Hill, located in West Lake, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province
isolated peak
Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
bridge/CL:座[zuo4]
magpie bridge across the Milky Way between Altair and Vega where Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed an annual meeting
river bank
Jinshan Temple, where Fahai lives (from Madam White Snake)
misty rain/drizzle
Qiaotou or Chiaotou township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
either end of a bridge/a bridgehead
Xiao Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
arch bridge
(literary) that person (usually female)/she/one's intended
pavilion
handrail
fine rain/drizzle/poem by Tang poet Li Shangyin 李商隱|李商隐
balcony/high building (esp. in poetry)/tower
